document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic review of Chinese species of ground beetles of the subgenus Pseudoophonus (genus Harpalus) (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic review of Chinese species of ground beetles of the subgenus Pseudoophonus (genus Harpalus) (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ophonus ( Pardileus ) Davidi
Tschitschérine, 1897
: 45
. Type locality: "province Schen-si" [= Shaanxi], China .

Harpalus ( Pardileus ) horni
Jedlička, 1928 b
: 92
. Type locality: "Tsingtau" [= Qingdao], Shandong, China .

Harpalus ( Pardileus ) Jedlickai
Schauberger, 1929
: 184
. Type locality: "Hweisin" [= Hui-Xian], Gansu, China .
Harpalus zouhari
Jedlička, 1961
: 157
. Type locality: "Talien" (=Dalian), Liaoning, China .

Harpalus ( Pseudoophonus ) adenticulatus
Huang, 1992
: 59
, 63, syn. n. Type locality: Beibei, 260 m , Chongqing, China .
Harpalus ( Pseudoophonus ) kailiensis
Huang, 1992
: 61
, 64, syn. n. Type locality: Kaili, 760 m , Guizhou, China .
Harpalus ( Pseudoophonus ) cilihumerus
Huang, Hu & Sun, 1994
: 263
, 267, syn. n. Type locality: Anyue, Sichuan, China .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material
. A syntype of
H. horni
: ♀, labeled "Tsingtau, Proff. Hoffmann", "Mai", " Type ", "
Horni
sp. n. mihi, det. Ing. Jedlička", and "Mus. Nat. Pragae, Inv. 21336 " ( NMP ).

Holotype of
H. zouhari
: ♀, labeled "Talien, China bor., 4. 59 , Zouhar leg.", " Typus ", "
Harpalus zouhari
sp. n. , det Ing. Jedlička", "Mus. Nat. Pragae, Inv. 65456 " ( NMP ).

Paratype of
H. kailiensis
: ♀, labeled "Guizhou, Kaili, 760 m , middle August of 1980 " [no collector] [in Chinese ], "
Harpalus ( Pseudoophonus ) kailiensis
" ( SAUCH ).

Paratype of
H. cilihumerus
: ♀, "Sichuan, Anyue, Kangjiaqiao, 419 m ,
19 .VII. 1982
, Huang Tongling leg." [in Chinese ], "
Harpalus ( Pseudoophonus ) cilihumerus
" ( SAUCH ).

Paratype of
H. adenticulatus
: ♀, "Sichuan (Ya'an), 620 m ,
12 .VIII. 1982
" [in Chinese ], "
Harpalus ( Pseudoophonus ) adenticulatus
[Huang's handwriting]" ( SAUCH ).

Additional material examined . More than
365 specimens
( 347 from China ), including the following specimens from Anhui, Beijing, Hebei, Hubei, Henan, Zhejiang and Hunan.
China
. ANHUI :
1 ♂
, Yanshan Nongchang (Farm),
VIII. 1980
( IOZ ). BEIJING:
1 ♂
, Ba Da Ling,
2 .IX. 1981
, Yu Peiyu leg. ( IOZ );
2 ♂
, same data as preceding, but
17 .VII. 1981
( IOZ ); 1 ♀, Haidian Distr., Wofosi,
8 .VI. 1980
, Yu Peiyu leg. ( IOZ );

, Beijing,
7 .VI. 1952
, Zhang Yiran leg. ( IOZ );
1 ♂
, Beijing, Xiangshan (Botanical Garden),

, Yu Peiyu leg. ( IOZ ); 1 ♀, Sanpu,

( IOZ );
1 ♂
, same locality,

, Zhao Jianming leg. ( IOZ ). HEBEI :
1 ♂
, Wulingshan Mts., 700 m ,
4 .IX. 1982
, Yu Peiyu leg. ( IOZ ); 1 ♀, Xinglong,
4 .VI. 1981
, Yu Peiyu leg. ( IOZ ). HUBEI :
1 ♂
, 1 ♀, Shennongjia, 900 m ,
26 .VII. 1980
, Yu Peiyu leg. ( IOZ ); 1 ♀, same data as preceding, but 950 m ,
9 .VIII. 1980
( IOZ ). HENAN :
5 ♂
, 6 ♀, Neixiang Co, 600 m ,
12 .VII. 1998
( IOZ ). ZHEJIANG: 1 ♀, Lin'an Co.,
VIII. 1961
( IOZ ). HUNAN : 1 ♀, Hunan, Nanlongshan / 1981 .
VI. 20
[in Chinese ], "
Harpalus kailiensis Huang
, det. Liang Hongbin, 2003 ", "compared with type by Liang, 2003.5 " ( IOZ ).

Remarks . The synonymization of
H. kailiensis
(described from two specimens from Kaili, Guizhou),
Harpalus cilihumerus
(described from two specimens from Anyue, Sichuan) and
H. adenticulatus
(described from two specimens from Beibei, Chongqing and Ya'an, Sichuan) with
H. davidi
is based on the examination of the original descriptions and the paratypes of all three Huang’s species.
